IF ( (TEXT(Case.Severity__c)='Information Request' && TEXT(Case.CH_Stage__c)='Close' && Case.CH_SW_Build__c='' && TEXT(Case.CH_CaseCause__c)!='Nokia-Other'), "", IF ( (TEXT(Case.Severity__c)='Information Request' && TEXT(Case.CH_Stage__c)='Close' && TEXT(Case.CH_CaseCause__c)='Nokia-Other'), "游댯 Update Case Cause/Due to Severity&Stage not possible to Update SW", IF ( ((Case.CH_SW_Build__c='' && TEXT(Case.CH_CaseCause__c)='Nokia-Other') || (Case.CH_SW_Build__c='' && TEXT(Case.CH_CaseCause__c)='' && TEXT(Case.CH_Stage__c)!='Diagnosis & Technical Analysis')) && ( not ISBLANK(Case.CH_PlannedAutomaticQualificationDateTime__c)), "游댮 Update Case Cause, SW Build and PAQ" , IF ( (Case.CH_SW_Build__c='' && TEXT(Case.CH_CaseCause__c)='Nokia-Other') || (Case.CH_SW_Build__c='' && TEXT(Case.CH_CaseCause__c)='' && TEXT(Case.CH_Stage__c)!='Diagnosis & Technical Analysis') , "游댮 Update Case Cause and SW Build", IF ( ((TEXT(Case.Severity__c)!='Information Request' &&Case.CH_SW_Build__c='' && TEXT(Case.CH_CaseCause__c)='Nokia-Other') || (TEXT(Case.Severity__c)!='Information Request' &&Case.CH_SW_Build__c='' && TEXT(Case.CH_CaseCause__c)='' && TEXT(Case.CH_Stage__c)='Diagnosis & Technical Analysis')) && ( not ISBLANK(Case.CH_PlannedAutomaticQualificationDateTime__c)) , "游리 Update SW Build, Case Cause if known and PAQ", IF ( (TEXT(Case.Severity__c)!='Information Request' &&Case.CH_SW_Build__c='' && TEXT(Case.CH_CaseCause__c)='Nokia-Other') || (TEXT(Case.Severity__c)!='Information Request' &&Case.CH_SW_Build__c='' && TEXT(Case.CH_CaseCause__c)='' && TEXT(Case.CH_Stage__c)='Diagnosis & Technical Analysis') , "游리 Update SW Build and Case Cause if known", IF ( ((TEXT(Case.CH_CaseCause__c)='Nokia-Other' || TEXT(Case.CH_CaseCause__c)='' && TEXT(Case.CH_Stage__c)!='Diagnosis & Technical Analysis')) && ( not ISBLANK(Case.CH_PlannedAutomaticQualificationDateTime__c)), "游댯 Update Case Cause", IF ( (TEXT(Case.CH_CaseCause__c)='Nokia-Other' || TEXT(Case.CH_CaseCause__c)='' && TEXT(Case.CH_Stage__c)!='Diagnosis & Technical Analysis'), "游댯 Update Case Cause", IF ( (TEXT(Case.CH_CaseCause__c)='Nokia-Other' || TEXT(Case.CH_CaseCause__c)='' && TEXT(Case.CH_Stage__c)='Diagnosis & Technical Analysis' ), "游릭 Update Case Cause if known (early Stage)", IF ( Case.CH_SW_Build__c='' && not ISBLANK(Case.CH_PlannedAutomaticQualificationDateTime__c) , "游리 Update SW Build and PAQ", IF ( Case.CH_SW_Build__c='', "游리 Update SW Build", IF ( not ISBLANK(Case.CH_PlannedAutomaticQualificationDateTime__c), "游댯 PAQ Date Present. Please Qualify!", CASE(Case.CH_CaseCause__c, "Nokia-Other", "Case function created to eliminate not needed cases",CASE(Case.CH_SW_Build__c,"", "Case function created to eliminate not needed cases", "")) ))))))))))))
